title: #308: Sober Octobert; A November to Rebender (@BertKreischer)
itunes:title: Sober Octobert; A November to Rebender with Bert Kreischer
description: Bert Kreischer joined me to talk about alcohol. He's an expert on the subject. For real. We split the podcast up, doing the first half while he was 25 days into his sobriety, and then we did the 2nd half a week later when he was 3 days into a booze cruise.

itunes:author: Ari Shaffir
